scripts.create-prod: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=production node contorltest.js
scripts.create-dev: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=development node contorltest.js
scripts.sync-dev: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=development node sync-db.js
scripts.sync-prod: cd tools && cross-env DEPLOY_TYPE=production node sync-db.js
